name: Doubles: Drinking Games for 2
description:
Who said you can’t have a party with just two people? Doubles is a fun, exciting drinking game designed for – you guessed it – two players!

With categories from best friends and drinking to sexy couples and truth or dare, Doubles contains hours of hilarious party fun whether you’re playing with a buddy or your lover! Have endless laughs answering questions like:

• Who can name the most Nicholas Cage movies to avoid drinking?
• Which one of you initiated the first kiss?
• Would you plan a heist with your significant other or best friend?
...And 100s more!

Choose the categories you want enabled to customize your couples drinking game and get ready to laugh so hard your tummy hurts!

Whether you want to play truth or dare, never have I ever or compete to answer hilarious questions to avoid drinking, with Doubles you always have a party in your pocket!

COME AND JOIN THE PARTY – DOWNLOAD DOUBLES TODAY!

Find out more at drinkotron.com
